<h1 align="center">
  Counting to Infinity
</h1>

Welcome to Counting to Infinity! My goal with this blog is to help visualize topics in math, computer science, and anything else that I find interesting. If you have suggestions for blog post ideas, feel free to reach out at [ekqian@upenn.edu](mailto:ekqian@upenn.edu).
